consulting_details.description: Details specific to the terms of a professional consulting engagement.

scope_of_services_summary.description: A brief summary of the advisory services the consultant will provide.

compensation_summary.description: A summary of the payment terms (e.g., '$5,000 monthly retainer', '$250 per hour', 'Project-based fee').

term_of_agreement.description: The duration of the consulting engagement.

confidentiality_clause_summary.description: A brief summary of the confidentiality obligations.
